doc.abstracts: This field note describes the experience of pilot training and accreditation of professionals and technical expertise in water and sanitation projects with a holistic approach, implemented under the second phase of the pilot project to improve management and sustainability of the district water and sanitation-PROPYL II, which takes place in the department of Cajamarca, Peru. To strengthen municipal leaders and convert them to use a strategy for district water and sanitation, it requires access to human resources that are qualified and capable of designing policies and strategies to implement a project approach.
